metadata.title: CVE-2017-6059 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Mod_auth_openidc.c in the Ping Identity OpenID Connect authentication module for Apache (aka mod_auth_openidc) before 2.14 allows remote attackers to spoof page content via a malicious URL provided to the user, which triggers an invalid request.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-openidc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3-1build1').
